title: Server error or bug possibly, can riot assist please
body: Upon completion of my promos, i found i was not met with the usual "you have been promoted to ......." that pops up after the game. The Post game screen registered victory but the winning of my promos had not been registered. I took a screenshot that is now attached. When i looked at my match history it was fine, but looking at my league my promo games had "shifted along" as in my second promo had become registered as my first and my third had become my second. Can someone please shed some light on the matter.

replies.body:
>May or may not be related to the severe lag that some people have been experiencing.

Nothing's perfect. You've done all that needs to be done.

If this happens to you *again*, though, then you'd want to look into that.

Hopefully it never does though!
Well i played my 4th promo and thankfully won, but if this bug happened to someone at high elo and they happened to lose their promos due to it i can only imagine how disheartening it could be.
